sect2.title: Introduction to GNOME Panel
sect2.para: The GNOME Panel package contains the menu and applet systems.

sect2.title: Installation of GNOME Panel
sect2.para: Install GNOME Panel by running the following commands:

userinput.command: ./configure --prefix=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0` \ --libexecdir=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0`/sbin \ --localstatedir=/var/lib --sysconfdir=/etc/gnome --disable-gtk-doc && make && make install && chmod 644 `pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0`/share/gnome/help/\ {fish-applet-2,window-list,workspace-switcher}/C/*.xml

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --libexecdir=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0`/sbin: This switch puts libexec files in $GNOME_PREFIX/sbin instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/libexec.
--sysconfdir=/etc/gnome: This switch puts configuration files in /etc/gnome instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/etc.
--disable-gtk-doc: This switch prevents the rebuilding of documentation during the make command.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GNOME Panel package contains libpanel-applet-2 libraries and applets.

sect3.title: libpanel-applet libraries
sect3.para: libpanel-applet libraries allow development of small applications (applets) which may be embedded in the panel.

sect3.title: Applets
sect3.para: Applets included are Workspace Switcher, Window List, Inbox Monitor, Clock and Wanda the Fish.
